name: Bobcat Trivia Quiz | NBA Teams | 5 Questions

questions.text: Who was the first owner of the Bobcats?
questions.explanation:
Robert Johnson.

	Robert Johnson was the first minority to own a majority share of an NBA team.

questions.text: In what season did the Bobcats debut?
questions.explanation:
2004-05.

	The Bobcats played their first game in the 2004-05 season.

questions.text: What other professional sports team, did the first Bobcat owner also own?
questions.explanation:
Charlotte Sting.

	Robert Johnson owned the Charlotte Sting, the WNBA counter-part to the Bobcats.

questions.text: What team left Charlotte, allowing the Bobcats to choose Charlotte as a home?
options: They are the first NBA team in Charlotte
questions.explanation:
Charlotte Hornets.

	The New Orleans Hornets originated in Charlotte during the 89-90 season.
